quotes.quote: Seek respect, not attention. It lasts longer.
Seek the miracles in sacred moment.
Seek first to understand, then to be understood.
What we seek we shall find; what we flee from flees from us.
Do not seek to bring things to pass in accordance with your wishes, but wish for them as they are, and you will find them.
Seek not the favor of the multitude; it is seldom got by honest and lawful means. But seek the testimony of few; and number not voices, but weigh them.
If we seek things that are virtuous and lovely, we surely will find them. Conversely, if we seek for evil, we will find that also.
We should not seek to tune out the realists' whines or taunts, as they may provide good instruction.
Most people seek after what they do not possess and are enslaved by the very things they want to acquire.
Seek that which within lies waiting to begin the fight of your life that is everyday.
Seek always for the answer within. Be not influenced by those around you, by their thoughts or their words.
Seek happiness for its own sake, and you will not find it; seek for duty, and happiness will follow as the shadow comes with the sunshine.
Who seeks shall find.
Seek truth from facts.
Never seek illicit wealth.
Seek freedom within action.
What we seek is what we are.
What you seek is seeking you.
Seek people who seek solutions.
Seek for good, but expect evil.
Seek simplicity but distrust it.
Don't seek the water; get thirst.
Don't seek permission to be happy.
He who seeks equity must do equity.
Do not seek praise. Seek criticism.
Seek to give much—expect nothing.
Do not seek death, seek destruction.
To seek the highest good is to live well.
Seek not to understand that you may believe, but believe that you may understand.
If you seek truth you will not seek victory by dishonorable means, and if you find truth you will become invincible.
